industry: Personal Care Product Manufacturing and Retail Health and Personal Care Products
description: Our client, an award-winning skincare brand based in El Segundo, is looking for a Social Media Marketing Coordinator to join their team for a 3 month contract! This role will work a hybrid schedule in office 2 days per week. Please note, this role will require 1 hour of community management in the evenings and then 2-4 hours on the weekends.
responsibilities:
Develop and implement social media strategies on Instagram to enhance brand visibility, engage the target audience, and drive growth
Create and curate engaging content for Instagram
Manage the social media content calendar, ensuring consistent posting and alignment with marketing campaigns and brand messaging
Monitor social media channels for trends, customer feedback, and industry news to identify opportunities for content creation and engagement
Respond to customer inquiries, comments, and messages in a timely and professional manner, fostering positive relationships and addressing concerns effectively
Collaborate with the marketing and design teams to create visually appealing graphics, videos, and other multimedia content that aligns with brand guidelines
Track and analyze social media metrics, generate reports, and provide actionable insights to optimize performance and inform future strategies
Stay updated on industry trends, social media best practices, and emerging platforms to recommend innovative approaches and maintain a competitive edge

qualifications.required:
Bachelor's degree in a related field
3 years agency account management, copywriting, marketing project management, marketing or digital experience idea
Prior social media and community management experience preferred
Strong proficiency with Microsoft Suite including Word, PowerPoint, Excel, Visio
Excellent organizational and communication skills
Strong customer service skills
Ability to multi-task in heavy workload environment
Flexibility to adapt to a fast-paced growing business model
